subject: Re: how do we promote a phonemic/phonetic writing sytem for english
msgSnippet: ... positivist s ... yeah ... what background do you see? and different how?
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Andii Bowsher <andii@o...> wrote:
> Just looking at the lojban websites it looks like a logical
positivist's
> wet-dream but a poet's nightmare! It betrays its cultural background
> just as much as Esperanto; just differently.

yeah ... what background do you see? and different how?
